title: Adult Coloring Books Keyword Research - Low competition and High Search Results

tactics.name: Keyword Niche Analysis
tactics.description: Identify low-competition keywords with high search volume using Publisher Rocket and Excel comparison.
steps: Use Publisher Rocket to extract keywords
Input data into Excel for search volume vs. competition analysis
Prioritize keywords with high searches and low competition scores
caveats: Avoid keywords with zero searches despite low competition
source_quotes: 'adult coloring book Italy... making the most money there nearly two thousand pounds per month'

tactics.name: keyword_combination
tactics.description: Merge keywords to reduce competition while maintaining search volume
source_quotes: combine keywords to make it even less competitive

tactics.name: spelling_variants
tactics.description: Leverage plural/singular variations for higher search volume
caveats: Ensure correct spelling matches user intent
source_quotes: landscape search way more times they're both got the same competitive score

tactics.name: Keyword Combination Strategy
tactics.description: Combine low-competition keywords with high-search-volume terms to improve visibility
caveats: Requires additional marketing for high-competition keywords
source_quotes: combine that with other keywords so you could do Italian fashion for example

heuristics.name: Low Competition Boost
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has a competitive score of 1 and high search volume, prioritize it
source_quotes: '70s... competitive score of one is pretty good'

heuristics.name: volume_vs_competition
heuristics.condition: If search_volume > 1000 and competition < 50, prioritize niche

heuristics.name: Competitive Score Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If competitive_score < 30 and search_volume > 1000, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: go with something with a lower competitive score
